body: This hefty waraxe is similar to the common dwarven waraxe, but its recurved blade spans forward and back from its head like a deadly butterfly. A dwarven double waraxe grants a +1 bonus on all attack rolls after the first when using Cleave or Great Cleave.
name: Waraxe, Dwarven Double
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Dwarves/New Racial Rules/Dwarven Equipment/Waraxe/Dwarven Double
